description: Titanium is a strong, lightweight metal known for its exceptional corrosion resistance. It is widely used in aerospace engineering, medical implants, chemical processing, and high-performance equipment. Titanium forms a protective oxide layer that prevents rust, even in harsh environments. Its strength-to-weight ratio makes it ideal for applications where durability and low mass are essential. Although difficult to extract, titanium’s reliability and biocompatibility justify its extensive use in advanced industries.
name: Titanium
